original_text: So I tell you this. People may get money in wrong ways. But you should use it to do good to those who need help. Then they will be your friends. You will die, one day. Then those people will be happy to see you in that place where people live for all time.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 말하노니 불의의 재물로 친구를 사귀라 그리하면 그 재물이 없어질 때에 그들이 너희를 영주할 처소로 영접하리라

sentences.original_text: People may get money in wrong ways.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 잘못된 방법으로 돈을 얻을 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: But you should use it to do good
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그것을 선을 행하기 위해 사용해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Then they will be your friends.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들이 너의 친구가 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Then those people will be happy
to see you in that place
where people live for all time.
